articles.description: A tweak to Bazball makes England a more dangerous side and there were encouraging signs in the win over West Indies in the second Test, writes Jonathan Agnew.

articles.description: Having waited so long for one, Xander Schauffele has won two majors in two months. Now he is eyeing a career grand slam.

articles.description: Aston Martin start testing the new 'hypercar' with which they will return to Le Mans in 2025.

articles.description: Lando Norris agonised over whether to hand victory in the Hungarian Grand Prix back to team-mate Oscar Piastri but said it was the “fair" and “honest” thing to do.
articles.title: Lando Norris: I didn’t give up the win. I lost it off the line

articles.description: Former Aston Villa manager Carla Ward is set to join Emma Hayes' staff at the Olympic Games in Paris.

articles.description: Russia will have just 15 athletes at the Olympics competing as neutrals - BBC Sport looks at what they can expect at Paris 2024.

articles.description: Rangers will meet Dinamo Kyiv or Partizan Belgrade in the third qualifying round of the Champions League.
